title: BENNINGTON 3-PRONG 3.75MM, LAB WHITE SAPPHIRE RIVIÈRE NECKLACE, SILVER
description: The Bennington Rivière is crafted with lab-grown white sapphires in a minimal three-prong setting. Layer with Campbell, our three-prong graduated rivière, for added drama.
